comment._content: It must be at 16 Ice House Street, Central , Hong Kong

comment.author: 9166691@N04
comment._content:
From Wikipedia:
Club Lusitano Building, at No. 16 Ice House Street. The Club Lusitano is a gathering place of the Portuguese community. Previously located at Shelley Street, it has been located at Ice House Street since 1866 (according to other sources, the Club was located at Shelley Street from December 1866 to 1920).
